goal.en: To train graduate students to do research, to read papers, and to prepare for academic writing
goal.ch: 訓練研究生學術研究, 閱讀論文, 以及學術寫作的能力

content.en:
(1) Group testing regression theory
(2) Tests for supervised dimension reduction methods
content.ch:
(1) 群試迴歸理論
(2) 監督式維度縮減法之檢定問題

textbook.en: (1) Vansteelandt, S., Goetghebeur, E., and Verstraeten, T. (2000). Regression models for disease prevalence with diagnostic tests on pools of serum samples. Biometrics, 56, 1126--1133. (2) Huang, S.-H., Shedden, K., and Chang H. (2023). Inference for the dimension of a regression relationship using pseudo-covariates. Biometrics, 79, 2394--2403.
textbook.ch: (1) Vansteelandt, S., Goetghebeur, E., and Verstraeten, T. (2000). Regression models for disease prevalence with diagnostic tests on pools of serum samples. Biometrics, 56, 1126--1133. (2) Huang, S.-H., Shedden, K., and Chang H. (2023). Inference for the dimension of a regression relationship using pseudo-covariates. Biometrics, 79, 2394--2403.

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導

en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現
